meanings.definition: Of extremely poor quality or taste; cheap or inferior.
meanings.sent1: The shlockiest movie I've ever seen had terrible acting and a ridiculous plot.
meanings.sent2: The store was filled with shlockiest items that fell apart after one use.
meanings.sent3: I bought the shlockiest sunglasses, and they broke as soon as I put them on!
meanings.sent4: The shlockiest painting in the gallery looked like a child's finger painting.
meanings.sent5: The shlockiest restaurant in town served cold, tasteless food at high prices.

meanings.sent1: He always buys the shlockiest products, and then wonders why they break so quickly.
meanings.sent2: The market was full of the shlockiest goods, with no real value or durability.
meanings.sent3: I found a box of shlockiest toys at the thrift store, and they were all missing parts!
meanings.sent4: The shlockiest of all the antiques in the shop was a rusty, broken clock.
meanings.sent5: The shlockiest of the souvenirs was a tacky keychain that fell apart as soon as I touched it.
